Text: OK guys only thing i have to mention about 30 days of night is there a little run off with the subtitles a couple of words in english pop up after the vampires speak no big deal doesnt take from the film hope you guys enjoy it Next film Ferris Bueller unless u want the ugly truth first i just got done with a little bit ago
